column4: any idea why my system would go 100% cpu for about 7 seconds every minute or so, in which time no programs respond, including when typing?
maybe the video driver. It happens, it may be a bug.
I have top running in a terminal, and when it starts responding again, it shows 50% cpu on Xorg, so maybe it is.

yes, I've seen it too. For some reason Xorg sometimes sucks a lot of resources. It has to do with the drivers and 3D acceleration. For instance I don't use 3D, and even gedit lags pretty bad sometimes.  Don't use just "top", use "htop"
